description: Detects a suspicious Microsoft certutil execution with sub commands like 'decode' sub command, which is sometimes used to decode malicious code
false_positives: False positives depend on scripts and administrative tools used in the monitored environment
name: Suspicious Certutil Command Usage
query: ((process.executable.text:*\\certutil.exe OR winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"CertUtil.exe") AND process.command_line.text:(*\ \-decode\ * OR *\ \-decodehex\ * OR *\ \-urlcache\ * OR *\ \-verifyctl\ * OR *\ \-encode\ * OR *\ \-exportPFX\ * OR *\ \/decode\ * OR *\ \/decodehex\ * OR *\ \/urlcache\ * OR *\ \/verifyctl\ * OR *\ \/encode\ * OR *\ \/exportPFX\ *))
author: Florian Roth
juju4
keepwatch
